html:
Feb 3 (Reuters) - Amazon.Com Inc AMZN.O:

  • AMAZON.COM ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS

  • Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $27.75

  • Q4 SALES ROSE 9 PERCENT TO $137.4 BILLION

  • SEES Q1 SALES $112 BILLION TO $117 BILLION

  • AMAZON - QTRLY NORTH AMERICA NET SALES $82,360 MILLION VERSUS $75,346 MILLION

  • AMAZON - QTRLY AMAZON WEB SERVICES NET SALES $17,780 MILLION VERSUS $12,742 MILLION

  • AMAZON - QTRLY AMAZON WEB SERVICES OPERATING INCOME $5,293 MILLION VERSUS $3,564 MILLION

  • Q4 2021 NET INCOME INCLUDES A PRE-TAX VALUATION GAIN OF $11.8 BILLION INCLUDED IN NON-OPERATING INCOME FROM STOCK INVESTMENT IN RIVIAN

  • AMAZON.COM - OVER HOLIDAYS, WE SAW HIGHER COSTS DRIVEN BY LABOR SUPPLY SHORTAGES AND INFLATIONARY PRESSURES, AND THESE ISSUES PERSISTED INTO Q1 DUE TO OMICRON

  • AMAZON.COM - WILL INCREASE PRICE OF A PRIME MEMBERSHIP IN U.S., WITH MONTHLY FEE GOING FROM $12.99 TO $14.99, AND ANNUAL MEMBERSHIP FROM $119 TO $139

  • Q1 2022 OPERATING INCOME IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $3.0 BILLION AND $6.0 BILLION

  • AMAZON.COM - FOR NEW PRIME MEMBERS, PRICE CHANGE WILL GO INTO EFFECT ON FEBRUARY 18, 2022,

  • FOR CURRENT PRIME MEMBERS, NEW PRICE WILL APPLY AFTER MARCH 25, 2022, ON DATE OF THEIR NEXT RENEWAL

  • QTRLY ONLINE STORES SALES $66,075 MILLION VERSUS $66,451 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR

  • QTRLY ADVERTISING SERVICES SALES $9,716 MILLION VERSUS $7,350 MILLION

  • QTRLY TOTAL OPERATING EXPENSES $133,952 MILLION VERSUS $118,682 MILLION

  • QTRLY THIRD-PARTY SELLER SERVICES SALES $30,320 MILLION VERSUS $27,327 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR

  • AMAZON.COM - Q1 OPERATING INCOME GUIDANCE INCLUDES ABOUT $1.0 BILLION LOWER DEPRECIATION EXPENSE DUE TO INCREASES IN ESTIMATED USEFUL LIVES OF SERVERS & NETWORKING

  • Q4 REVENUE VIEW $137.55 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA

  • Q1 REVENUE VIEW $120.04 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AMZN.O
